ComicInfo.Title: Reicher Castle Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: Reicher Castle Part 2: Koshka is in the bowels of Reicher Castle fighting cyber-apes but is overcome and captured by Major von Thaler who promptly ties her up and takes her top off. She gets some unexpected help from super-ape, Markus, who leads her out of the castle and into the waiting arms of Joe and his men who were preparing to mount a rescue. The Allies blow up the castle before the orbiting missile base can be deployed but von Thaler escapes.
ComicInfo.Characters: Major Sigrid von Thaler,Talon,Zombie Soldiers,Ears,Joe,Bam Bam,Chef,Cyber-Apes,Captain Koshka Rudinov,Markus,Scope,Golan
